mapper.delete:
delete from sys_resource where id in
#{item}
mapper.select: select id, pid, uid, sort, level, res_code, res_name, res_type, res_href, permission, remark, tenant_id, enable from sys_resource where res_type=2 and uid = #{bean.id}
select id, pid, uid, sort, level, res_code, res_name, res_type, res_href, permission, remark, tenant_id, enable from sys_resource where enable=0

select b.ids, f.id, f.pid, f.uid, f.sort, f.level, f.res_code, f.res_name, f.res_type, f.res_href, f.permission, f.remark, f.tenant_id, f.enable from sys_resource f left join ( select group_concat( c.id separator ',' ) as ids, d.res_id, d.tenant_id from sys_user_action c, sys_permission d where c.id = d.act_id and c.tenant_id = d.tenant_id and c.enable = 0 group by d.tenant_id,d.res_id ) b on f.id=b.res_id where f.enable=0
and f.tenant_id = #{bean.tenantId}

select id, pid, uid, sort, level, res_code, res_name, res_type, res_href, permission, remark, tenant_id, enable, create_time, create_user_id, create_user_name, update_time, update_user_id, update_user_name from sys_resource where pid=0 and uid=0 and tenant_id = #{bean.tenantId}

select (select GROUP_CONCAT(act_id order by act_id) from sys_permission where res_id=a.id group by res_id) as ids, a.id, a.pid, a.uid, a.sort, a.level, a.res_code, a.res_name, a.res_type, a.res_href, a.permission, a.remark, a.tenant_id, a.enable, a.create_time, a.create_user_id, a.create_user_name, a.update_time, a.update_user_id, a.update_user_name from sys_resource a where a.id = #{bean.id}
